record.name: NeoLudditeOptions
record.prop: The API key received from the app.
The environment (e.g., `dev`/`staging`). The production env must be indicated as `prod` which is billed.

record.name: CsrfCheckOptions
record.desc: Options for validating a csrf token.
record.prop: Use this middleware for every request.
Check for the presence of token in `ctx.request.body` (requires prior Form-Data middleware). Used in POST requests.
Check for the presence of token in `ctx.query` (requires prior Form-Data middleware). Can be used in GET requests.
